none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 08, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
This was one of my favorite straight punk demos from 2016, and I straight up missed the fukkrs when they rolled through town because I was at work. In the world of excuses, which is simultaneously the lamest and most understandable (or, at least in my case, predictable) excuse imaginable. Tough as nails and more infectious that anything else you're gonna listen to today.... PMS84
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KI9daAtui20/WHKrGn0ge1I/AAAAAAAAQWQ/AOsHi6hMrc4zNb6AyAVvTms2LhBuuWTyQCLcB/s1600/PMS84%2Binside%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: PMS84 - PMS84 • 2016 - Terminal Escape
